Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: rejedejo
Reviews.Content: Pros: Works fine, 12VDC for easy external powering.cons: doesn't do split screen on any two channels, only 1&2

Reviews.Title: worth its price
Reviews.Author: Gerard Mc Ewen
Reviews.Content: Item was received in good shipping time, when installed worked great out of the box! will order again thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bobby Lucas
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, It has made life very easy watching over my business with surveillance.

Reviews.Title: Quad Splitter
Reviews.Author: JRM "JRM in Ohio"
Reviews.Content: Aside from the booklet that was likely written by a non English speaking person, this unit fits the bill just file.  The price is certainly right and it works as advertised.I did hook up the video out to my PC and was not pleased with the quality of the video as displayed there.  However, it might be that the problem resides in the device that goes between the two.  I'm still working on that problem.  Otherwise I would buy this unit again.

Reviews.Title: I will have to say that there doing a good job
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: love this .Its a great processor foe the money .If I ever need another I will order again its a great buy

Reviews.Title: unit failed after about 4 weeks!
Reviews.Author: Robert Lewis
Reviews.Content: Worked good for about 4 weeks then quit working completely. It was plugged into a good surge protector, don't understand what happened and cant find info to exchange or repair. Not happy!

Reviews.Title: green lites/no manual
Reviews.Author: whats this
Reviews.Content: it works great except at times it will start flashing all of the lights and no picture, have to unplug it and reset it, --- no manual to explain anything, the  book that came  with it dont even fully tell you how to operate the box, much less what things mean, is there anyone who can tell me where to find a real manual, and what is causing the green lights to blink

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: todd (Maryland)
Reviews.Content: This product worked great... for the first day. After that it only displayed scrambled lines. I will be returning this immediately.

Reviews.Title: This product did not work.
Reviews.Author: muzzie
Reviews.Content: First this product looks similar to an item I have that wore out after 9-years.However, it is quite different, as follows:1) The connectors are all different so I had to make 2 trips to Radio Shack.2) The Power AC/DC Adapter Plug is horizontal my last one is Vertical. I am installing this is a Home System Cabinet so the space is limited. This resulted in requiring another Power Strip.Total additional cost of $60.00.3) After finally getting it connected, it failed to work. Only one Camera would come on regardless of the settings. After fooling with it for hours I went out and purchased a new 19-inch monitor, another $190.00 wasted.4) So spending another 90 minutes and still only one Camera would display no matter what the setting, I returned this piece of crap.==> Do NOT purchase one of these. I cannot say enough BAD things about this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Four camera outputs can be combined into one video signal for simultaneous display and recording
Selectable picture in picture modes, quad split mode, full screen mode, PIP screen mode, dual split mode, auto sequence mode
Camera title, time and date display for easy identification, 4 channel BNC input and 3 video BNC outputs
Freeze picture capability for each camera, audible notification of motion detected
Plug and play, very simple to install, comes with 12V power supply, free remote controller
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel CCTV Surveillance Security Camera Color Video Quad Processor Splitter Real Time with Remote Controller C43
